Test Name: Miscellaneous Ocular Immunology Tests (Autoimmune Disease Panels, Cytokine Assays, Immunofluorescence Staining)
Purpose: To detect autoantibodies, quantify cytokine levels, and visualize specific antigens in ocular specimens for the assessment of immune-mediated ocular conditions.
Container: Sterile container for ocular fluid or microscope slide for tissue sections
Equipment: Microplate reader, Luminex analyzer, fluorescence microscope
